# Case Studies

## Ducks That Lead the Way

[![Kristov Paulus's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fkultura_logo_slim_8fba2a3725.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/kultura-capital/)

“Product velocity is a hallmark of any hypercompetitor. MotherDuck & Omni ship product with incredible speed, and that’s why we trust them to move with us.”

![Kristov Paulus's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FScreenshot_2025_05_08_at_10_29_30_AM_ac663c67b9.png&w=3840&q=75)

Kristov Paulus

Founder, Chief Investment Officer

[Kristov Paulus's page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/kultura-capital/)

[![Rob Teeuwen's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FGardyn_Logo_Horizontal_400x112_c075de8ca5.webp&w=3840&q=75)](https://mygardyn.com/)

“We used to do analytics in a MySQL database with all of our daily device, telemetry, and image processing data. There was no way to scale that further using MySQL. With MotherDuck, we’re finally starting to find patterns in our data to help customers grow produce more effectively.”

![Rob Teeuwen's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2F1689248039646_d794e5ebef.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)

Rob Teeuwen

Data Scientist

[Rob Teeuwen's page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/gardyn/)

[![Jim O'Neill's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Ffinqore_fe7857d6c1.webp&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.finqore.com/)

“Our data pipelines used to take eight hours. Now they’re taking eight minutes, and I see a world where they take eight seconds. This is why we made the big bet on DuckDB and MotherDuck. It’s only possible with DuckDB and MotherDuck.”

![Jim O'Neill's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fjim_oneil_photo_930c637f49.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

Jim O'Neill

Co-founder and CTO

[Jim O'Neill's page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/finqore/)

[![Ravi Chandra's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fdexibit_logo_2d070ff8e3.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://dexibit.com/)

“MotherDuck’s innovative approach to managing data and providing easy-to-use tooling has allowed us to expand our application use cases (e.g., getting data into the client's browser) and offer more value to our customers.”

![Ravi Chandra's photo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fravi_chandra_photo_7db3a4c457.jpg&w=3840&q=75)

## Explore all case studies

AllData WarehousingCustomer Facing Analytics

[Nico Ritschel's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/atm-com-analytics-costs-sql-expressibility/)  [![Nico Ritschel's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fatm_1_0fe4ee9409.svg&w=3840&q=75)](https://atm.com/)

### Cuts analytics costs by 65% while gaining SQL expressibility

- Moved analytics off of SingleStore, saving 65% on analytics costs
- Transformed analytics workflow and ML model development with MotherDuck

READ MORE

[Nate Hamm's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/reflex-careers-gig-economy-retail/)  [![Nate Hamm's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Freflex_3ad1ed4aca.svg&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.workreflex.com/)

### Accelerates retail analytics while avoiding expensive BI tools

- Moved analytics off production Postgres, enabling customer-facing reports
- Deferred thousands monthly on Tableau by improving data architecture

READ MORE

[Dave Crusoe's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/dosomething-non-profit-tco-cost-savings/)  [![Dave Crusoe's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FDo_Something_c872643285.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://dosomething.org/)

### Reduced costs while empowering users to find their own answers

- Migrated from Postgres to MotherDuck, eliminating overnight analytics queries
- Empowered non-technical colleagues to explore data independently with the MotherDuck UI

READ MORE

[Jake Casto's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/layers-multi-tenant-data-warehouse/)  [![Jake Casto's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Flayers_logo_d023d0e735.svg&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.uselayers.com/)

### Turns costly analytics blocker into go-to-market enabler

- Cut data pipeline processing time from 24+ hours to under 1 hour
- Enabled per-tenant data retention flexibility, letting customers choose 5-180 days without infrastructure changes

READ MORE

[Hidde Stokvis's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/trunkrs-same-day-delivery-motherduck-from-redshift/)  [![Hidde Stokvis's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Ftrunkrs_logo_3c611c30c7.svg&w=3840&q=75)](https://trunkrs.nl/)

### Accelerates same-day delivery analysis and decisions

- Replaced costly, high-maintenance Redshift setup with a serverless architecture
- Transformed daily operations via instant drill-downs in Looker for faster issue resolution and deeper analysis

READ MORE

[Josh Lichti's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/udisc-motherduck-sports-management/)  [![Josh Lichti's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fu_disc_logo_95b92cceda.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://udisc.com/)

### Improved analytics query performance from minutes to seconds

- Chose MotherDuck after finding ClickHouse, Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery too complex and expensive
- Enabled lifetime course analytics for 16,000+ courses after MongoDB queries proved impossible

READ MORE

[Kristov Paulus's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/kultura-capital/)  [![Kristov Paulus's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fkultura_logo_slim_8fba2a3725.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/kultura-capital/)

### Built a Data-First Investment Platform with MotherDuck and Omni

- Migrated from local DuckDB files to cloud infrastructure instantly with zero configuration changes
- Empowered non-technical investment analysts to explore complex data models without engineering bottlenecks

READ MORE

[Rob Teeuwen's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/gardyn/)  [![Rob Teeuwen's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FGardyn_Logo_Horizontal_400x112_c075de8ca5.webp&w=3840&q=75)](https://mygardyn.com/)

### Reduced Analytics Pipeline from 24+ Hours to Under One Hour

- Unified analytics across MySQL, Postgres, and MongoDB data sources in one efficient warehouse
- Enabled complex time-series analysis on 150+ columns of IoT data at 10x lower cost

READ MORE

[Jim O'Neill's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/finqore/) [![Jim O'Neill's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Ffinqore_fe7857d6c1.webp&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.finqore.com/)

### Transformed 8-Hour Financial Data Pipelines into 8-Minute Workflows

- Launched AI-powered financial agents using MotherDuck's performance to enable real-time data exploration
- Migrated from Postgres to achieve 60x faster pipeline execution for complex financial data

READ MORE

[Dominik Moritz's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/dominik-moritz/)  [![Dominik Moritz's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2FCarnegie_Mellon_University_wordmark_svg_0a953fa401.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://www.cmu.edu/)

### Achieved Interactive Browser Visualization of 18 Million Data Points

- Built a fully interactive data exploration app in just one hour
- Delivered sub-second query responses through hybrid local-cloud execution without managing any servers

READ MORE

[Ravi Chandra's Case Study page](https://motherduck.com/case-studies/dexibit/)  [![Ravi Chandra's company logo](https://motherduck.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmotherduck-com-web-prod.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fassets%2Fimg%2Fdexibit_logo_2d070ff8e3.png&w=3840&q=75)](https://dexibit.com/)

### Unlocked Lightning-Fast Analytics and New Customer Capabilities

- Reduced analytical query times from minutes to seconds while eliminating traditional data warehouse costs
- Enabled new browser-based data experiences impossible with Postgres or Snowflake alternatives

READ MORE
